title: Natural Crystals

cleaned_text: Natural Crystals All our crystals are 100% natural and sourced from all over the world. Each gem is hand-picked by us to ensure the best quality. Some photos you see here are of the exact crystal you will receive. While others will be similar to the crystal shown in the photo. Crystals are a natural product so you will see some variation.
